title: Cartoos
subtitle: Design of a Spanish deck of cards
excerpt: Spanish deck of cards submitted to Fournierâ€™s 140th anniversary contest. 6th finalist.

description.text: Fournier is a well known Spanish playing card manufacturer, one of the most important in the world. In 2008, to celebrate their 140th anniversary, they organised a 40 cards Spanish deck design contest.
This is my submission for the aformentioned contest, in which I finalised in 6th position.
